name: luataxx
description:
# Overview
luataxx, an Ataxx engine written in Lua

## Features
- A simple and hackable code base
- Modular architecture
- Very lightweight: Less than 1000 sloc !
- Very nice PrintBoard. No need for buggy GUIs !

## Buying this software
I'm selling this software with source code. So end-user can easily modify the source code to his/her liking.

## Help
```
lua luataxx.lua -help
```

## Help
- You need a lua interpreter
- Then just start playing > lua luataxx.lua -aitime 10000 -play 3
- Nothing else . That's it
